title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes two of the criteria below.

title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must state a perfectly competitive market will produce the same quantity as the perfectly price-discriminating monopolist and explain why in order to receive the point.
descriptions: The response does not state that a perfectly competitive market will produce the same quantity as the perfectly price-discriminating monopolist and/or does not explain that perfect competition produces the quantity where P = MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngB PrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9fr Fj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=x fr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaabaaaaaaa aapeGaamiuaiaabccacqGH9aqpaaa@3D50@ MC MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngB PrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9fr Fj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=x fr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eaca WGdbaaaa@3C4D@ and the perfectly price-discriminating monopolist will produce the same quantity to earn all profit possible.
